home.name: Tomasz Skorupski
home.lead:
I design, implement, and maintain IT systems and infrastructure that ensure stable and secure business operations. I offer administration, network services, tailored solutions, and ongoing technical support.
I am currently creating my own business solutions and actively seeking long-term collaboration.
home.caption: The technological foundation of your business

about.title: Shellty
about.videoInvite: If you prefer listening over reading ‚Äì feel free to watch my short video introduction
about.approachIntro: I‚Äôm not just a developer, nor just an administrator. I am a versatile specialist who sees the bigger picture. My hybrid expertise ensures that the solutions I design are not only innovative but also infrastructurally robust.

points.design: Design & Improve: I write code and build applications while taking care of their architecture, testing, and optimization to eliminate defects.
points.deploy: Deploy: I use Git and Docker and develop core CI/CD skills so that my workflows are repeatable and safe.
points.support: Support & Understand: Thanks to experience in IT Support and Administration, I understand the user perspective and operational challenges. I know how crucial stability and security are in day-to-day work.

about.growth: In parallel, I‚Äôm developing my competencies by delivering my own projects. While professionally I focus on your needs, privately I‚Äôm passionate about the development and practical use of AI agents in automation ‚Äî which always translates into a better understanding of modern architectures.
about.goal: I‚Äôm not looking for "just another gig". I‚Äôm actively seeking a Partner or Employer with whom I can build a relationship for years. I care about a place where I can bring real value from day one and continuously grow my competencies through ambitious, joint projects.

facts.locationValue: Stargard, Poland ‚Ä¢ open to remote work/hybrid

streetcom.where: Streetcom ‚Ä¢ IT Systems Administrator & Junior Developer
bullets: Comprehensive management of the IT environment, including administration of systems, servers and databases, as well as their development and modernization - with a focus on stability, security and the real needs of everyday users.

Resolving employees‚Äô technical and functional issues based on collaboration, analysis and understanding how technology affects their daily work - from minor hiccups to complex incidents requiring deeper diagnostics.

Creating and developing content and functionality in internal systems, including documentation, modules and enhancements that improved communication, streamlined processes and increased efficiency across the company.

Participating in automation and process-optimization initiatives by designing tools and solutions that eliminated repetitive tasks, improved system reliability and noticeably enhanced user experience.

Deployment and integration of secure/pull printing systems for clients across diverse industries - from production floors to accounting offices and notary chambers - tailored to their workflows, processes and real business needs.
Resolving technical issues remotely and on-site through direct communication, process analysis and rapid adaptation of solutions that restored the continuity of entire teams‚Äô work.
Optimization and stabilization of printing environments, including streamlining device communication, improving throughput and reducing latency affecting key operational processes.
Ongoing supervision of devices and printing environments, proactive monitoring and rapid response to anomalies so that technology remained a safe, predictable work tool for clients.

Administration of systems and network infrastructure, including rolling out new technologies, modernizing the environment, and ensuring the stability and security of tools used across the organization at every level.

Building a new server room from the ground up: physical assembly, configuration and commissioning of network and server hardware - a project requiring precision, planning and responsibility for the foundations of the company‚Äôs entire infrastructure.
Ensuring uninterrupted operation of key applications and services - from operational tools to end-user systems - with quick incident response and a strong focus on minimizing downtime.
Close cooperation with users and teams, focused on rapidly resolving tickets, explaining how systems work and fostering an environment where technology genuinely improved daily work.
Configuration and supervision of IT systems and administration of network infrastructure supporting the institution‚Äôs stable operations and secure flow of data in day-to-day team work.
Ongoing user support in daily tasks, swift response to tickets and resolution of technical issues - helping turn technology into a tool rather than an obstacle for employees.
Ensuring continuous availability of systems and services, monitoring their performance and promptly eliminating irregularities to minimize downtime and keep core operational processes efficient.
Collaboration with various departments to better understand their needs and adapt IT solutions to how they actually work.
IT support for retail: service tickets, diagnostics and repair of POS equipment.
Network and device configuration, IT assets inventory.
Fiscal devices service - solving diverse issues across many locations.
Service and configuration of printing devices, user hardware support in bank branches.
On-site diagnostics and work continuity restoration.
Preparing, configuring and deploying new equipment in the field.
Remote IT support for hospitals and emergency medical teams.
Handling tickets: diagnostics, incident resolution, escalation.
Configurations and changes: workstations, medical apps, permissions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitleHtml: My public portfolio is currently modest, as most of my past projects were developed for employers and remain subject to sharing restrictions. At the same time, I am creating a series of my own demo projects - new items will appear here soon. Please note that I use free cloud backend servers, which may result in a so-called cold start.

testAccount.title: Test account
testAccount.note: Log in to see the application features
testAccount.noteKsef: Use the following data to test the integration with KSeF

postlio.title: Smart Social Media Assistant
postlio.subtitle: Create, schedule, and publish posts on FB, IG, and LinkedIn with AI
postlio.description:
Postlio is a modern PWA application supporting social media management. It allows for creating and scheduling posts and graphics with the support of various types of AI Agents. The system enables full automation of publication according to a schedule for business accounts (Facebook Pages, Instagram Business, and LinkedIn). For personal profiles, due to platform regulations, the application is used for professional content preparation for manual sharing.

The project is currently deployed for testing purposes. I am focused on improving UX and finalizing the application approval process by Meta. After obtaining full API access, users will be able to share their materials directly from the application.

smartQuoteAI.title: SmartQuote AI ‚Äì Intelligent Sales Assistant
smartQuoteAI.subtitle: CRM system with an AI assistant for sales management
smartQuoteAI.description:
A CRM web application supported by Google Gemini, which automates the creation of offers, contracts, and customer analysis. The system features a PDF generator with VAT calculation, automatic follow-ups, and a statistics dashboard. Currently in the testing and optimization phase.

Coming soon to SmartQuote AI:
‚Ä¢ Interactive offers: dynamic web formats instead of static PDFs.
‚Ä¢ Integration with KSeF Master: automatic invoicing after offer acceptance.
‚Ä¢ Expanded AI: even deeper data analysis and negotiation support.
‚Ä¢ Mobile version: PWA application for managing sales from a phone.

ksefMaster.title: KSeF Master: Intelligent E-invoicing Evolution
ksefMaster.subtitle: Integration with KSeF: downloading and issuing invoices
ksefMaster.description:
KSeF Master is an advanced tool based on a proprietary, stable backend that guarantees reliable communication with the KSeF API. Currently available in the browser, the platform will soon gain a Windows version in offline-first mode, ensuring work continuity even without network access.

What sets the system apart:
‚Ä¢ Security first: automatic detection of suspicious invoices through analysis of advanced parameters.
‚Ä¢ Full compliance: quick PDF generation and customer database support according to official standards.
‚Ä¢ Upcoming improvements: introduction of qualified certificate login and a dedicated user authorization module in the web version.

shelltyBlog.title: Shellty Blog
shelltyBlog.subtitle: Engineering Academy Project ‚Ä¢ .NET 8
shelltyBlog.description:
A project developed as part of Nerds Family Engineering Academy, emphasizing software engineering, design patterns, and Clean Code principles. It is a modern CMS system based on MVC architecture, fully containerized (Docker) and integrated with a cloud PostgreSQL database (Neon).

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Democratic permissions: custom role assignment system through administrator voting.
‚Ä¢ MVC Architecture: clean code structure following best practices.
‚Ä¢ Containerization: full Docker support ensuring easy deployment and scalability.

mobiSalon.title: Grooming Business Card with CMS
mobiSalon.subtitle: Website for a grooming salon
mobiSalon.description:
This is a light and clear one-page website designed with Next.js/React. The project combines an aesthetic presentation of a grooming salon with functionality that facilitates daily communication with customers. The site is fully responsive, which guarantees its impeccable operation and readability on smartphones and tablets.

The heart of the site management is the News section, over which the owner has full control from the CMS panel (Decap CMS). They can instantly publish there:
‚Ä¢ Current announcements: important information about promotions, changes in the offer, or announcements for customers.
‚Ä¢ Availability calendar: an interactive summary where the administrator marks working days and free slots, informing customers about the salon's current schedule in real time.

pwaCookbook.title: Mobile Cookbook (PWA)
pwaCookbook.subtitle: Progressive Web Application - diploma project
pwaCookbook.description: I developed a progressive web application (PWA) that helps in planning meals based on ingredients available in the kitchen. It integrates a recipe database, preparation instructions, and side dish cooking times, and a built-in timer with sound notification facilitates process control. The application was designed with a mobile-first approach and also works offline, remaining available on any device with a browser. As a result, it realy shortens the time spent on cooking and facilitates decision-making "what to cook". Project implemented based on React with an emphasis on performance and user convenience. It was created as part of a diploma thesis.

animalsOnePage.title: Interesting Animals - One Page
animalsOnePage.subtitle: Simple One Page website (student project)
animalsOnePage.description: A very simple, static one-page website prepared during studies as part of one of the tasks. It presents selected, interesting animal species in short sections with basic information and trivia. I treat it as a modest supplementary material showing consistency in documenting progress. I am aware that this is not a project representative of my current skills and I will soon replace it with newer, original projects.
